$eref.description: Data schema to define a person or legal entity.
$eref.title: Entity Schema

___credit_impaired.description: Flag to determine if the entity credit quality is impaired.

___parent_id.description: The unique identifier for the ultimate parent of the person or legal entity.

___type.description: The designated financial or legal entity category this person or legal entity falls under

___risk_country_code.description: Two-letter country code describing where the risk for the security resides. In accordance with ISO 3166-1

___intra_group.description: Flag to indicate that this should be considered an intra-group entity.

___legal_entity_name.description: The official legal name of the entity.

___ssic_code.description: The Singaporean standard industry and sector classification.

___version_id.description: The version identifier of the data such as the firm's internal batch identifier.

___cqs_irb.description: The credit quality step for internal ratings based approach.

___lei_code.description: The LEI code for the legal entity (for corporates).

___country_code.description: The person or entity country of residence. Two-letter country code as defined according to ISO 3166-1.

___sic_code.description: The UK SIC 2007 standard industry and sector classification.

___source.description: The source(s) where this data originated. If more than one source needs to be stored for data lineage, it should be separated by a dash. eg. Source1-Source2

___reporting_relationship.description: Relationship to reporting entity. See: relationship.

___name.description: The name of the person or legal entity to be used for display and reference purposes.

___count.description: Describes the number of entities represented by this record. eg. joint customers should have a count > 1.

___id.description: The unique identifier for the person or legal entity within the financial institution.

___cqs_standardised.description: The credit quality step for standardised approach.

___risk_group_id.description: The unique identifier for the group representing a single risk entity where no relationship of control exists

description: Data schema to define a customer or legal entity related to a financial product or transaction.
title: Customer Schema

___status.description: The status of the relationship with the customer from the firm's point of view.

___start_date.description: The date that the customer first became a customer. YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ in accordance with ISO 8601.

___product_count.description: The number of active products/trades this customer has with the firm.
